resources.string: The Graphs and Analysis of Bitcoin price past and future performance provided by CoinsFriendly.com include forecasts, projections and other predictive statements that represent our assumptions and expectations in light of currently available information. These forecasts, etc., are based on Bitcoin industry trends, circumstances involving various state and non-state actors and other factors, such as new regulation being introduced, and/or new scientific discoveries to do with Blockchain and Bitcoin protocol, etc. They involve risks, variables and uncertainties. The Bitcoin price actual performance results may differ from those projected in these forecasts. Consequently, no guarantee is presented or implied as to the accuracy of specific forecasts, projections or predictive statements contained herein. Your capital is at risk. CoinsFriendly.com does not assume any responsibility for the profits or losses made while using our data analysis products in trading in Bitcoin.
